content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### First Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0, 0))

### Second Furnace at position (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (2, 0))

### Iron Gear Wheel Factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position not specified) that crafts iron gear wheels from iron plates.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure the furnace has enough space in its inventory before attempting to insert items. The maximum capacity is 50 items, and if it is full, the insertion will fail.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Ensure there are enough items in the furnace to extract. If the furnace is empty, the extraction will fail.

### Repeated errors in furnace usage
- The agent repeatedly attempted to insert items into furnaces that were full. Always check the inventory status of the furnace before inserting items to avoid this issue.

### Errors when crafting
- When crafting items, ensure that there are enough raw materials in the inventory to complete the crafting process. If materials run low, it may lead to crafting failures or incomplete actions.
